name: superpowers
description: Superpowers Agent Skills - Systematic development practices for generative agents
author: earchibald

bootstrap.description: Initialize shared Superpowers cache from upstream obra/superpowers repository

brainstorm.name: brainstorm
brainstorm.description: Generate creative solutions and explore ideas - use before any creative work

write-plan.name: write-plan
write-plan.description: Create detailed implementation plans from specifications or requirements

execute-plan.name: execute-plan
execute-plan.description: Execute an implementation plan with checkpoints in a separate session

tdd.name: tdd
tdd.description: Implement code using strict TDD cycles - write failing test first

investigate.name: investigate
investigate.description: Perform systematic root-cause analysis of bugs and test failures

verify.name: verify
verify.description: Ensure fixes work before claiming success with verification evidence

worktree.name: worktree
worktree.description: Create isolated workspace for parallel development using git worktrees

finish-branch.name: finish-branch
finish-branch.description: Merge, create PR, discard, or keep development work - handles branch lifecycle

review.name: review
review.description: Request code review from subagent - mandatory after each task

receive-review.name: receive-review
receive-review.description: Respond to code review feedback with technical rigor

subagent-dev.name: subagent-dev
subagent-dev.description: Dispatch subagents for task-by-task development with review checkpoints

dispatch-agents.name: dispatch-agents
dispatch-agents.description: Run concurrent subagent workflows for independent problem domains

write-skill.name: write-skill
write-skill.description: Create new skills following TDD best practices

superpowers.name: superpowers
superpowers.description: Learn about Superpowers capabilities and how to find and use skills

initialization.on-first-use: Run bootstrap script if cache doesn't exist
behaviors: Link to ~/.cache/superpowers/skills if cache exists after bootstrap
Fall back to bundled if cache unavailable

platforms.agents: Any agent supporting Agent Skills standard
